import './index.css' import {Component} from 'react' import MoneyDetails from '../MoneyDetails' import TransactionItem from '../TransactionItem' const transactionTypeOptions = [ { optionId: 'INCOME', displayText: 'Income', }, { optionId: 'EXPENSES', displayText: 'Expenses', }, ] // Money Manager Main class MoneyManager extends Component { state = { title: '', amount: 0, transType: transactionTypeOptions[0].optionId, balance: 0, income: 0, expenses: 0, historyList: [], } updateTitle = event => this.setState({title: event.target.value}) updateAmount = event => this.setState({amount: event.target.value}) updateTransType = event => this.setState({transType: event.target.value.toUpperCase()}) render() { const {title, amount, transType} = this.state console.log(title, amount, transType) return (

Hi, Richard

Welcome back to your Money Manager

Add Transaction

History

Title Amount Type
) } } export default MoneyManager
